item.title: Version 1.2.19 (Build 20260113.1)
item.description:
What's New

feat: Add multi-line macro content support

  • CharacterInjector: Handle newline/tab characters specially

- Send Return key (0x24) for newline instead of Unicode \n

- Send Tab key (0x30) for tab instead of Unicode \t

- Add sendReturnKeyInternal() and sendTabKeyInternal() helper methods

- Update sendTextChunkedInternal() to split text by special chars

- Update sendTextOneByOneInternal() with special char handling

  • MacroSection: Redesign add macro form UI

- Replace TextField with auto-expanding TextEditor for content

- Add textEditorBackgroundCompat() for macOS 12 compatibility

- Clean layout with abbreviation field and Add button

- Update EditMacroSheet with same improvements

  • MacroManagementViewModel: Support multi-line in import/export

- Escape newlines as \\n when exporting

- Unescape \\n to actual newlines when importing

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
